title: Stuck at honor lvl 2
body: My friend is lvl 25 and he got honor lvl 4. He never gets honors and i get atleast 1 per game (no premade). I think there is something bugged with the system. I have got 3 honors like 6 times.

replies.body: There is no bug with the Honor system!  It will vary with honor, games played, and behavior.  I looked into this for you, and there may be a few games where you weren't playing the most honorably.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our PB team can offer more context so you can recover your honor gains from there.
